description: A minimalistic, customizable, and beautiful browser built on Electron

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');function fixTar(dir){try{const pkgPath=path.join(dir,'package.json');if(fs.existsSync(pkgPath)){const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath));if(pkg.name==='tar'&&pkg.version<'7.5.3'){console.log('Fixing tar in',dir);fs.writeFileSync(pkgPath,JSON.stringify({...pkg,version:'7.5.3'},null,2));}}const files=fs.readdirSync(dir);for(const f of files){const full=path.join(dir,f);if(fs.statSync(full).isDirectory()&&!f.startsWith('.')&&f!=='node_modules'){try{fixTar(full);}catch(e){}}}}catch(e){}}fixTar('node_modules');"
